alert.note: Alert for West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 25 at 3:22AM MDT until April 25 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...West Central Mountains and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Areas of blowing dust are expected. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
